text: The Chile national under-20 football team represents Chile in international football completions. They have hosted the FIFA U-20 World Cup in 1987 and 2025. Their best placing at the tournament was in 2007 where they finished in third place. ==Competitive record== ===FIFA World Youth Championship Record=== Year Round GP W D L GS GA 1977 Did not qualify
